general_advisory: Watch for rain before applying pesticides. In fallow uplands, utilize recent rainfall for short duration low water requiring crops. Regular surveillance for insect pests. Possibilities of pest and disease build up due to high humidity.

advisory: Keep the rice plots weed free.
